AttributeRegistry.description: The Attribute Registry for the Attributes resource
AttributeRegistry.longDescription: The reference to the Attribute Registry that lists the metadata describing the attribute settings in this resource. Attribute settings appear as additional properties in this resource, and can be looked up in the Attribute Registry by their AttributeName.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

^(([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfi.description: This can be any odata or Redfish properties or Attribute names.
^(([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfi.longDescription: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property, or a valid Attribute Name specified in the Attribute Registry.

title: #Attributes.1.0.0.Attributes
